data.name: Archie's Backyard Retreat
data.address: 3023 Keller Hicks Rd, Fort Worth, TX 76244

reviews.text: From the very beginning I thought the whole plans were off in 2020.  The fact that they added taxes after the estimate. It rained when they put concrete in ground for the post. They should dried the stain and redid concrete.  One post is off by 6 inches.    You can never reach anyone and they lie all the time.  It was a couple of months after the project that it rained and the pergola bled stain All around onto my patio furniture.   So a few months later it rained terrible for over a month.  The

My Cedar Patio Cover was started within the promised time and finished within the estimated time given.  The workmanship is really good.  The jobsite was left neat after every day.  The price given was really competitive, at almost half of several of the quotes received from other local companies. They were not the cheapest quote I got, but they were the most professional and I do not regret, at all, paying just a little more for their professionalism. He had a book with lots of pictures of prev

I hired this company to extend my patio and build a pergola.  The contractor came out and I explained to him what I wanted. He took the check 12/17/2021
and for the the next three months, he was MIA.  That is until all the mistakes that he made with the project started to hit the fan. Then, he was ready to contact and blame me for the shoddy work. The pergola footings were never placed into the ground. The concrete was starting to fall away. The pergola was the wrong size.  When they realized th

NO! NO! NO!
Beware of this business. I will always be on top of reviewing this company whom built our patio. Our slab started cracking immediately and did they repour the slab ? No ! They dug two holes next to the slab and filled with concrete and told me they were support pillars. They had a fly by night helper come and do the work. I had to pay someone to overlay flagstone over the cracked concrete slab.
The fly by night helper when finished tried to convince me that the owner said he could ha

Archies backyard is very difficult to get in touch when the work is almost complete.  They had one of their workers come out they were supposed to have someone cover up the electrical work that was done.  They said they already paid the guy and he quit the working for him once he was paid but work was never complete.  They refuse to send anyone else out or return my phone calls.  I also went over the amount of water that was coming on in the one side he said they would send someone out, I have l

We hired Archie's to build our covered patio and outdoor kitchen.  While everything looks nice I am giving a 2 star review due to lack of information and the delay in getting the project complete.

When we agreed to the project they gave us a start date - It was a week later and they sited rain as the delay even though there was either no rain, it would sprinkle in the early morning and be perfect the rest of the day, or better yet it would rain in another part of town - NOT EVEN IN OUR AREA!.

Huchappa Jayappa

I am extremely pleased with the pavilion built by Dan Archie. All my friends admired the detailed workmanship that went in building the pavilion and everyone liked the design and final outcome. Dan Archie and his crew showed extreme professionalism during construction of pavilion. The pavilion was built as per agreed specification. Dan Archie came out quite frequently when the work was being done to ensure that the work was done in satisfactory way. The work was initiated on ti

If you are looking for a company that is responsive and follows up on their stated commitment to make things right, warranty their work, and communicate with you DO NOT USE this company.  I have tried for over 4 weeks to get Dan Archie to come out to look at and repair a large broken piece of dura-plast as well as trim pieces they installed 24 months ago on our arbor and as far as I know he has not come out to even look at it.  I have called their main number no less than 15 times and never once
They did an absolute amazing job on back yard patio cover! We are in love with or outdoor kitchen that we have been using almost every night while weather is great! Highly recommend them👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼 …

Came out took some measurements.  I provided them a 2D and 3D of the backyard designs and told them what i wanted.  Never heard a word from them again.  Left 2 messages and 2 emails...  Ok experience when they were here.
Very professional and accommodating. Worked around my schedule and was very hospitable. It’s a family company so everyone was very involved in my patio work. Highly recommend.
Great job, we love our new patio.
We had a patio cover installed. Very nice. Good price.
Amazingly built patio…wouldn’t go anywhere else for my backyard needs!
